name: Robo.Inc (Atomic)
description:
Robo.Inc is my final year uni project created within Unity in VR.

As I am more of a 3D/Technical Artist It's intended to showcase my asset creation, game design & player onboarding skills more than the programming.

Late in development, the game had a major change in direction and I decided to switch the XR Interactor over to SteamVR as it had some quality of life improvements that were difficult to create via code using the XR Interaction Toolkit. Sadly it seems SteamVR & OpenVR are no longer and XR Toolkit is the way to go forward.

I don't plan on continuing this game in the future but I thought it would be awesome to showcase it to anyone who is willing to try it out. Leave a comment if you enjoyed it :)

The game has been tested on an Oculus Quest 2 the most, however, during playtests people were reporting that it also works on the Valve Index so let me know how well it works on your PCVR headset!

A lot of the foundational mechanics such as Airdusting, Screwing & Game Manager code were created by a programmer, you can check out his version of the game here!: https://lifeofthecookie.itch.io/roboinc
